General.Name: Aerospace CH UAV Co Ltd
General.Description: Aerospace CH UAV Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, production, maintenance, and sale of capacitor films in China. The company also offers optical-grade polyester, solar cell backing, and packaging films. In addition, it is involved in the manufacture and sale of capacitor; provision of aviation, spacecraft, and equipment technical consulting services; equipment leasing; design, research, and development of computer software; and real estate owning activities. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Nanyang Technology Co., Ltd. Aerospace CH UAV Co.,Ltd was founded in 2006 and is based in Beijing, China.
